text: Which of the following plugins would you add to your application to improve SEO?
When is the "init" hook fired in a WordPress plugin?
options: Just before any plugin executes code
When WordPress is installed for the first time
When the WordPress site has just finished loading
answer: When the WordPress site has just finished loading

What does the priority parameter in the WordPress add_action function do?
options: Determines theme to load first when the plugin runs
Adds an action to the hook list
Takes a variable, modifies it and returns the result to WordPress
Determines the order that callback functions run at when a hook occurs
answer: Determines the order that callback functions run at when a hook occurs
